title: NSW Central Coast Waterfront Escape Just 90 Minutes from Sydney with Multi-Course Dinner Upgrades Available
description:
Your dreams of beachfront bliss will come true on the tranquil shores of New South Wales' Central Coast, where Mantra Ettalong Beach awaits. Just a 90-minute drive from vibrant Sydney, this captivating destination offers a wealth of natural wonders. Explore the abundance of national parks, lush forests, unspoiled beaches and native wildlife that grace this remarkable area. Immerse yourself in the enchanting coastal lifestyle from a collection of one and two-bedroom suites with private balconies and spa baths, offering all the comforts of home.

Start each day at one of the beach's charming cafes and savour your morning coffee before setting off to explore hidden beaches or lounge poolside. The Central Coast is renowned for its fantastic mix of laidback living and adventures among nature, from walking and cycling trails at Warrah Trig and Pearl Beach to the lookouts and beaches of nearby Bouddi National Park. Whether travelling as a couple or with friends and family, Mantra Ettalong Beach is the perfect spot to call home for your stay.
offer_address: 53-54 The Esplanade, Ettalong Beach, New South Wales 2257, Australia
